title: Level 5 Teemo Main

replies.body: With that kind of name (TheSmellyDevil), I am inclined to believe you are the level5 Teemo main one

Nah i'm not cancer.
His name is 6Cranx9

I have a wife who is a level 5 Teemo main.

Maybe you should marry him?
Praise him for being a dedicated ass hat.

Tell him this:

_if really friendly - 'Dude, you really good on Teemo, didn't know you were that good' :D_
_If he's / she's a dick - 'Bro, fuking play a champ that has more cc or more skill, i'd prefer both btw' ;3_
Gift them all the Teemo skins.
Salute the wonderful man. Such a great feat to be a master disciple of the lord Teemo himself

Burn him alive.
Then drown him.
Then chop his remains up into tiny pieces, draw a pentagram and sacrifice him to Satan.
Oh wait.
